(&촀\0Do you know what today is,
n\0? 
\0(!촀\0It's the Bug-Off!\0\0(%촀\0If we all work hard today, we can
make sure that n\0 is
bug-free forever!
(촀\0n\0\0Is that not the point of the event?

('촀\0I've never liked the term "bugs."
\0
There are so many different kinds!
\0
(촀\0It's rude to simplify like that.
()촀\0You've got insects, arachnids,
myriapodsn\0\0the list goes on!\0\0(
촀\0I suppose they do have one thing
in common. 
\0(촀\0They all count in
the Bug-Off!

()촀\0You know what catching bugs is
like? 
\0It's kind of like making new
friends, n\0.
('촀\0You can't come on too strong or
you'll scare folks away.
\0 So you
move in slowly with a smile.
(9촀\0And when you finally get close,
that's when you swing the net
and trap them forever!
(촀\0Wait, what were we talking about?

(&촀\0You know how the Bug-Off works,
right?
\0 (%촀\0You're trying to catch as many
bugs as you can in a short time.
(촀\0So don't go trying to catch a whole
bunch of bugs before the event,
because those don't count!

(&촀\0You know how to enter the
Bug-Off, right? 
\0Just go talk to
\0Flick \0￿in the plaza.
( 촀\0Me?
\0(('촀\0 I'm gonna pass on this one.
\0
I inhaled a bug by accident this
morning and that was enough.
